siteMetadata.title: Thulio Philipe, Software Developer
siteMetadata.description: I have been working as a software developer for almost 10 years. I already worked with ad agencies, startups,software studios and also as a consultant, always focused on the Front-End side (UI). My current focus is on WebApps and some topics that guide my studies are Performance, Security, User Engagement and Code Quality I like to share my knowledge through talks, articles and all repositories on my Github are open. My current focus is on WebApps and some topics that guide my studies are Performance, Security, User Engagement and Code Quality.
